"Seabed Ecological Survey":
"In the seabed area of planet Wopal,
an extremely violent species of Oceanids
has emerged. If left alone, it will cause
massive damage to the area. All available
ARKS are to sortie when ready and repel
the violent Oceanids.

――――――――――――――――――――
Clear: Collect [250] Quest Points
by defeating Oceanids."
